subject: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,
Thanks for your mail I am waiting for the receipt attach you use to send the funds.
Thanks
Mrs. Mary Kumba

subject: Re:   Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Mrs. Mary Kumba,

I'm sorry for the confusion, but I haven't sent any funds yet. Could you please provide me with the details on how to proceed with the payment?

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
James
